item.description:
Hello all! IT HAS BEEN SO LONG since we have all gone to Jitters...and what better reason to go than to support an artist?

Bonnie Angels - Drawings - Opening Reception 4 to 7 p.m.

For those of you who have not been there, Jitters is a great place that is one of those hard to find gems that is really worth finding! Shirley, owner, offers live music on Friday and Saturdays, Comedy Nights, Yoga, Nia (http://www.jittersclu..., and various nutritional and holistic health events. There is also a spa (http://www.mothernatu... ) and holistic bookstore on premises. She also serves GREAT desserts and coffees.

See the site for all the info!

http://www.jittersclu...

http://www.jittersclu...

The event is FREE!!

AND to those of you who KNOW and LOVE Jitters, come see the changes!

After the reception, you can stay for dinner (SHirl has MORE THAN YOUR JUST DESSERTS these days!) and LIVE MUSIC if you like!

Kelly
item.name: A Jitters Art Opening!
